website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful, well-made stainless steel farmhouse sink with ample space, useful accessories, and an outstanding warranty.
pros: Durable stainless steel build with a modern brushed finish
Comes with a cutting board and stainless steel colander
Backed by a limited lifetime warranty
cons: Customer service could be more responsive

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sink and superior customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this sink is wonderful. But what I am most impressed with is the customer service. I am one of those who was flooded 10 months ago in Texas by Harvey and my whole hose had to be reconstructed from sheet rocked to new floors. So I had ordered the 33 inch by mistake but my cabinet was built for a 36 inch and I returned the 33 for the 36 and the company went out of their way to please us. Everyone that comes to our home loves the sink and all the accessories. Buy it will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bloodbought Girl

customer_reviews.title: Would give it 10 stars!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sink. The way it came packaged was surprising. Usually care and consideration doesn't go into the packaging but with this sink it did. The sink literally has a soft bag around it once I took it out of the number layers of packaging. Anyways, you won't be disappointed with this sink. I compared sinks to Lowe's. One, they didn't offer 16 gauge and two, they didn't have the accessories that Ruvati gives with the sink. Lowe's sink were 18 gauge and up and cost $399 and up. Love this sink and love the accessories. Good job Ruvati!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality product!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this sink for our new farmhouse. The sink arrived in a heavy duty box and the sink itself was in a protective bag as to prevent scratches. The sink was exactly what we expected and the quality surpassed our expectations. We honestly feel it is a focal point in our new kitchen! Design, style and quality all in one affordable package!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Casto

customer_reviews.title: I love this sink!
customer_reviews.text: This sink is a great addition to our new kitchen. It serves as a centerpiece work space in our island and the added features. i.e. colander, cutting board and drying rack makes it a real work horse. My headline is "I love this sink" but so does everyone who has come into the new kitchen, even the installers. One of then even took a picture and got the product info because he is re-doing his own kitchen. No regret so far.
customer_reviews.author: James H. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sink
customer_reviews.text: What a great sink and we especially liked the included accessories, cutting board, large strainer and sink guard. I am a DIY’er, so gave the installation a shot myself, was not too terribly difficult and rather than use 2x4’s for support as recommended, I bought some angle iron from Lowe’s for $8, the iron took up way less space and is hardly visible. The sink looks great alongside the newly installed concrete countertops. I would highly recommend this sink to others.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap sink
customer_reviews.text: Water sits in the bottom, rust, scratch easily, very hard to clean. Bad material
customer_reviews.author: reviewer 99

customer_reviews.title: Remodeling?  Rest with Ruvati.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fact that this quality produced Ruvati farmsink is made in the USA and in my state's capital of Austin Texas! If you are as picayunish as I am you will assuredly appreciate the exacting workmanship of this sink. Solid, thick, heavy and flawless in every descriptive detail listed in it's specs. The accessories are genius, fit perfectly in the recessed track and basin and are a value you can not compare to any of the competition. If a stainless steel farmsink is what you are surfing for; I suggest you pause and give Ruvati a second, third or fourth look. I did and really could not be more pleased with my purchase. Ecstatic actually!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Bowden Gregory Bowden

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This sink is beautiful, we get so many compliments on it. My contractor couldn't believe the price we paid was so low. Wipes down to a shine everytime. The strainer, cutting board, and rinsing rack are perfect. Thecadded bonus of the rack in the bottom is great and looks seamless instead of buying something after market. The only reason I gave it a 4 star is because there is no angle toward the drain, since the sink is so large you have to really rinse back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marie Skowronek

customer_reviews.title: Leaky problems
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking sink - many compliments, but they cheeped out with the drain assembly by using inferior parts. We had a new kitchen installed less than a year ago & it leaked, and ruined my brand new cabinets. The way companies do business now is beyond me. Why they would cheap out on the most functional part of the sink leaves one to think how stupid or cheap the engineers designing this sink are.
customer_reviews.author: RJS7424

customer_reviews.title: Very nice design... Universally liked and complemented.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well constructed sink with excellent design line... and the integrated options are both functional and beautiful. Its a central draw in the kitchen and the first thing everyone notices. The same people are usually surprised that the sink is only about $350 (30 inch). We installed it under a quartz counter-top with zero-reveal, with a Kraus 1602SS which complements the industrial design nicely. One minor snag: The first one arrived damaged, bent and scratched (outer box was fine though). Amazon was quick on replacement and return of the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Persepolis

customer_reviews.title: The pictures does not do this sink JUSTICE
customer_reviews.text: BEAUTIFUL Farmhouse Sink thank you for carrying such and item, my plumber and counter top installers loved it. Stainless Steel sink I cld Bathe a baby in this sink comfortably. This is one of many things I hve ordered from Amazon; buy it and u will c I can’t say enough abt this sink. It’s everything I cld not hve imagined. Thank you again the pictures do not do this sink justice
customer_reviews.author: Laura Young

customer_reviews.title: I like the product and value for the money spent
customer_reviews.text: I like the product and value for the money spent. This was basically the same price as any other comparable sink but with all of the bonus items. We use the rack and cutting board all the time. My only regret is that I didn't go with a 36" sink instead to have additional space for drying. The only thing I've noticed is if I'm dumping hot water when draining pasta that the bottom of the sink crinkles for a brief few seconds then stops, I'm sure it's just due to excessively hot water onto the cold metal. Otherwise, it's been a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Best “All Round” sink ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this work station, apron front sink. Not only is it beautiful but is functional, as well. I’ve never seen a sink with so many features. It is large enough to wash oversized items, and the rack in the bottom of the sink makes cleaning easy. I use the roll up rack to hold my scrubby container & hand soap. It’s, also, handy for draining dishes on. I haven’t used the large colander or cutting board, yet, but it will come in handy when cleaning & chopping vegetables for summer salads. The sink drains very well & the drain basket catches the items you don’t want to going down your drain.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Tate

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how this got a 4.9 for packaging from others. As a few others have noted, this is the one of the best packed item I've seen. Its extremely well designed to protect it from any chance of damage. This packaging engineer deserves a raise! The product itself is excellent as well, especially for the price point. The accessories look to be high quality and fit the sink very well. I've never had a shelf sink before so I thought they were just gimmicky add-ons, but I really think we'll use a few of them. Quality overall looks great. Good thickness of metal, and has sound dampening pads installed to avoid that tinny sound.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Fredericks

customer_reviews.title: Beware Scratches very easy
customer_reviews.text: This sink scratches very very easy and doesn’t drain well like description says. I have the protective rack that came with the sink down and you have to take it up a lot to push food etc down drain. The overall appearance is pretty and all the attachments were nice to have but the sink scratching drives me insane. I’ve been using a few months but wished I got a scratch resistant sink if there is a such thing. I’ve used nothing abrasive either.
customer_reviews.author: Ashli

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality, great look if you do not use it.
customer_reviews.text: This product looks beautiful as display. It’s. It practical though. It stains easily and it’s very hard to maintain. Even a splash of water makes look like it has not been cleaned in ages. Look is great quality is really really bad and it scratches real easy. Purchased in November 2018 installed in June of 2019.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Rabai

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful quality product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is excellent, packaging superb. I choose this farm sink for a new display being installed in my kitchen showroom. I wanted an affordable quality work station sink that I could recommend to my customers. At its price point with all the included extras and its quality this sink hits all the marks. I purchase this at retail and I am not a distributor for Ruvati. Just my honest professional opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design and quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is simply the best kitchen sink ever! My client is thrilled and the reasonable cost almost unbelievable. The accessories are the icing on the cake. As a builder I have pretty much seen and done it all so seldom do I get envious of a client's home but this has caused me great envy! I wish I had one!
customer_reviews.author: Missy M

customer_reviews.title: Installation
customer_reviews.text: As for the sink, it is of excellent quality, very satisfied. However the lack of installation descriptions/templates make installing into a cabinet a challenge for the even above average home owner. Recommend a pictured filer of installation directions. We adjusted the 2x4 support system to make room for plumbing also inset measurement for sink in cabinet. Most of our install was aided by online pics/comments.
customer_reviews.author: captduck

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Our new kitchen renovation is almost complete and people keep raving about my sink. It's massive and the accessories are super cool! This thing came packed like nothing else. They could have thrown it off the truck (they didn't) but if they had I doubt it would've hurt it. It's packed that well. Amazing sink!!!
customer_reviews.author: B. Tibbs

customer_reviews.title: Do your homework
customer_reviews.text: I like the clean undermount look of this sink, no clutter all business. The only thing I had any problem with was the final sink location. I was unsure of the best location for the sink front to back. I found out the hard way that you want to give yourself plenty of room at the rear near the wall for all your plumbing to fit and the hand soap dispenser. This took up the most room in my installation. I wish I had moved it out 3/4 of an inch, would have made thing much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky M.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice with Additional Amenities
customer_reviews.text: Great sink but poor customer service, despite having ordered 3 sinks. This sink was the wrong size. They wouldn’t refund us even though we ordered ANOTHER sink that was the RIGHT size. Beautiful sink. Just disappointed it was the wrong size and we’re out the $379.00.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sink
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I made for my kitchen remodel. I love all accessories that came with it. My contractor asked if I paid over thousand dollar for this sink. In fact I only paid fraction of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kuan

customer_reviews.title: Love this sink!
customer_reviews.text: If anyone is in the market for a sink highly recommend this one! I didn’t think my hubby would be so enthusiastic about a sink!!! He LOVES this thing. Our fave part is the roll up rack that it comes with that fits perfectly with the sink. Also comes with a cutting board and colander that fit and a bottom rinse grid.
customer_reviews.author: sc

customer_reviews.title: Great sink. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This sink is great all around. Installation was fairly quick and smooth. The depth of the sink is really nice. I love all the space. We’ve used all the accessories, they are well-made and sturdy. We get the most use out of the rack. It comes in handy for draining and letting things air dry. 2 months in with daily usage, we are very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: You absolutely will not be sorry with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 6th or 7th of these Ruvati sinks that I have ordered for customers. I am a custom Cabinet contractor and push the sinks due to their incredible build quality, fit and finish, and value for the money. I have yet to have a customer who is dissatisfied with these products. There is no question that I will absolutely be buying these again. As a matter of fact, any time a customer asks for a farm sink, this will be my go-to recommendation. In addition, I was given a 4 to 5 day delivery time, and it arrived in 2 days. I was extremely satisfied with every aspect of this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen L Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this sink. I love the accessories that come with it as well. It was difficult for me to adjust to the depth of the sink. I'm a tall person so having to bend over to reach the bottom of the sink can be tiring if I have a lot of dishes to do. But at the same time its great to have such a large sink to wash pots and pans.
customer_reviews.author: House of Henry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sink!
customer_reviews.text: We just replaced a brand new Kohler sink that had rust problems day one. This sink is beautiful...heavy duty and we love the ability to have a basket, cutting board and drying rack! Be Careful....you must order the correct size! We ordered the 36" for a 36" base cabinet by mistake...returned it and bought this 33"....which now fits perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Nanette

customer_reviews.title: Awesome farm sink!
customer_reviews.text: It looks amazing and lots of goodies come with it. Haven't installed it yet but will follow up with photos. This thing is packaged like you wouldn't believe. Quality all way down the line. I will follow up with some nice pics of the installation. So far no way to complain. Just by looking at it you can tell it's a very quality made product. It also comes in a nice cloth bag it's very quality that keeps it from getting scratched or anything and shipping. Thank-You!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this sink and accessories. I use the cutting board and dish dryer almost daily. Sometimes I use the dish dryer, to wash my pants on, so I don't have to lean into the sink as much. Also, I use it to set strainers on, so my veggies/fruit can drip out without obstruction. Cutting board is wearing out already from a lot of use. Sink itself, is a great size and depth. Really handy for bulky items.
customer_reviews.author: nnhb519

customer_reviews.title: Great sink!
customer_reviews.text: I love the sink and accessories. Lots of compliments. After 5 months of use, the rubber bumpers from the sink grid have left marks in the sink itself. I had to mindful to not rest pots on the ledge as I am washing. Resting things on the ledge have left scratch marks. Food does collect along the edges so I use my faucet's heavy sprayer to wash food away. Otherwise the grid does a great job keep the sink looking new. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Blackfeline

customer_reviews.title: Best sink ever!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! We are so pleased with this sink and all the features. While remodeling our kitchen we had no place to work except the cutting surface that came with the sink. The drying rack also came in very handy while we have no countertops to work. The sink is wonderful and I highly recommend this sink for anyone wanting a farm sink with extra’s.
customer_reviews.author: Susi edgington

customer_reviews.title: Good buy great sink.
customer_reviews.text: They do an outstanding job packing the sink. It’s a little tricky to install an apron sink but worth it once it’s in. The steel seems a little less likely to smudge up but it’s day one. It’s good quality steel and seems to be a 5 star product. 36” base cabinet requires the 33” sink. I did get a little confused with that.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great choice.
customer_reviews.text: Really love this product! Very well made and of very robust construction. The product arrived unblemished due to its sturdy packaging. This product compares very favorably with others costing at least twice as much. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: donesp

customer_reviews.title: No better sink out there
customer_reviews.text: We are in the middle of a kitchen remodel and the installation of this sink really upgraded the kitchen look and functionality. Wow! This sink is amazing and easy to install. You will need to modify the cabinet that holds it and counter top.
customer_reviews.author: J. C.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this sink!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my stainless steel farmhouse sink!!!! It is beautiful and we get lots of compliments. I love the accessories that it came with too-- it was a phenomenal value!! We finished our renovation a couple months ago and I still love the sink! It has been one of my favorite parts of the whole kitchen! It did seem like it was quite a project to install-- the contractor had to cut the right size hole in the cabinet which did not look easy-- but it turned out great!!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Kozminski

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This sink is bad a** first thing I bought for my kitchen redo , I jumped the gun a bit it sat in the box for months in the garage ..lol I finally got my cabinets in and this installed sadly haven't used it yet , countertop not installed yet, can't wait to use it . I have seen thus same item for much more, this was a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great sink?
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my kitchen. Was a little bummed that I wasn’t able to fit a 36’ sink however this sink looks great and the added pieces that come with it are awesome too. The straining rack works great for sponges and scrub brushes so they they don’t have to be mixed in with your dirty dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Karlee Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: This sink was shipped in packaging that was beyond safe and will not be damaged during shipping. This sink we purchased for a 30 inch apron sink base and it’s beyond gorgeous. We found out through installation the the sink should only stick out 1 1/2” where I had it set at 2 1/2” so after setting it back another 1” the counter tops will fit perfect with a custom look. I though this sink would not be wide enough but it is perfect in size and you don’t need anything bigger, if you do it’s just for looks. AMAZING SINK, A STEAL for the price.
customer_reviews.author: angela gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This was by far the best product that I have purchased in a long time. It fit perfectly, very easy to install and just simply beautiful. My plans are to order more products as I continue remolding my home. Thank you Ruvati.
customer_reviews.author: gloria mercado

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: This sink is fabulous. Our counter top installer was so impressed with it. He took the box and bag home with it. Where to big in? The construction and design are top par. The sink is deep and all my bake ware fit in it nicely. All the additional pieces are perfect as well. I just love my sink.
customer_reviews.author: Retiredarmymom

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: This is AMAZING!!! Super high quality and comes with all the extras! We saw almost the same one at a granite yard but it was twice the price so I checked on amazon. I was a little hesitant but we are just thrilled with the quality! Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: WmachIII

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Love this sink so nice looking and heavy and everyone comes to my house and has wow factor
customer_reviews.author: Busymommyof5

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Oh I love my Ruvati Farmhouse sink, my contractor just installed it, counters & backsplashes look Absolutely Gorgeous with it...Best value & my counter guy was vera pleased with my choice....Mahalo
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Apron sink 30inch
customer_reviews.text: It says it comes with a cut out sheet to help layout install... it does not. I called the company the told me to use the styrofoam it's about the same size...ya right ..seriously..lol Besides that everything is 5 star. I didn't need the cut out help it's just that the manual says they give you one ..again it doesn't come with one..
customer_reviews.author: BRYAN J LUTZ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sink.
customer_reviews.text: First off the packaging is amazing, super protected. Fit and finish is excellent. The accessories are very useful. Nice and thick stainless steel with sound deadening so no tinny sound. Overall we love this sink. The only thing that could be better is if a fingerprint resistant coating was used on the front. It isn't worse than any other stainless appliance, but it would make it perfect in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Dan B.

customer_reviews.title: I love my new Ruvati sink
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Ruvati sink. I was referred by a friend on Ruvati's excellent products and I can say that this product is, by far, my favorite purchase for the new updated kitchen. I will recommend this product to all my friends. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: toby primeaux

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking sink with extras.
customer_reviews.text: We had to order a replacement because the first one was tweaked and wouldn’t sit flush. Support was nice but just had to do it thru amazon replacement. Looks great and the extras are a move touch
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K

customer_reviews.title: I love the cutting board that fits perfectly on top and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile sink. It allows me to maneuver and work with ease. Very well made with lots of added features. I love the cutting board that fits perfectly on top and makes it very easy to chop and put to the side easily. I would definitely recommend this sink for anyone. I installed it in my farmhouse style kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: angelita

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING SINK & ACCESSORIES
customer_reviews.text: This sink is AWESOME!! We installed with our 3 inch thick Live Edge Pine Countertops and it looks amazing. We paired it with the Fapully Commercial pull down kitchen sink sprayer faucet and it is beyond expectations!! LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie L.

customer_reviews.title: All in one.
customer_reviews.text: It is great! It has bonus points for including the cutting board, the strainer, and the bottom rack! Exactly what o was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Donna H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this sink is amazing!! it has so many gadgets, also quality is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Arias

customer_reviews.title: Makes your kitchen feel like a pro
customer_reviews.text: This sink has saved my sanity. I have a big busy household and I love to cook. Seriously high quality. Feels professional!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Mama

customer_reviews.title: This sink ROCKS!
customer_reviews.text: This is the Best sink ever! It is hugh and has the dry rack, cutting board, strainer and a sink strainer. I love it! I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: RebeccaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very practical, attractive
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived very quickly , and fit perfectly into our newly renovated kitchen. It definitely makes our small kitchen appear larger. I also love the accessories it came with, I have put good use to all of them. Although I do notice it fors scratch easy. But overall it was a great purchase the whole family is happy with .
customer_reviews.author: Imelda Jacquez

customer_reviews.title: Rocky start, great sink
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this sink based on the company's statement that it would ship to our address; once we ordered, they informed us that that would not. Hijinks (not the happy kind) ensued, including a very large FedEx bill. Eventually, however, we received the sink. It was extremely well-packaged and protected, and its sturdy construction made install much easier. We've now been using it for 4 months, and love the size, depth, and ease of cleaning (with the exception of the grate, but even that's not terribly tough to wipe down). I'm 5'2", and can reach the bottom easily with no strain doing a sink-full of dishes.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: we was unsure if we would like an apron sink
customer_reviews.text: We have always had a dual sink in the past. So, we was unsure if we would like an apron sink, but we quickly discovered what we had been missing. We do not miss the second side of a sink at all. Clean up is easy and all of my guests compliment on the beauty of it. The down of the sink is: usage of water to clear the debris.
customer_reviews.author: Lora May

customer_reviews.title: Best Sink Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love love my/this sink! It so large and the rack going on the bottom keeps anything from scratching. It has enough slant that the food goes down into the drain (which is the best as it has a little handle to pull out and dump the trash). Also the accessories are the best, being able to drain (even on the rack in the bottom) veggies while still using the sink is great. I would advise you get one of these!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sink and all the extras that came along with it. Well worth the price. We purchased 30 inch sink and was installed on a 36 inch cabinet. We had a plumber install it because it was part of his price in the contact because we just built this home. You have to notch the cabinet precisely so the sink slides down. Have something under the sink to hold it until the counter top is installed.
customer_reviews.author: Liz from CT

customer_reviews.title: This is one fine sink!
customer_reviews.text: This is one fine sink. I am happy with the purchase and would definitely recommend.The cabinet installers loved the cutting board edges and all the items it brought. It came really well packaged and, even though box was damaged, sink was wrapped very well. They had to adjust the cabinet a bit so it would fit but it was well worth it. Pictures are without countertop and faucet as kitchen is still a work in process.
customer_reviews.author: Yaritza Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good look/quality
customer_reviews.text: I will admit I was not sold on the apron sink, but this looks great with our stainless appliances and the quality is very good as well. Plus, this comes with accessories which make it even better. Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: greyman

customer_reviews.title: Best sink
customer_reviews.text: This sink is beautiful high quality. The company is also great. Couldnt be more happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This sink is perfect in every way. I am so happy i went with the single sink rather than the split sink i have had for years. There is plenty of room in the massive sink to wash my bigger pans and pots without banging them on the sides. We got the 33 inch but it looks massive. A faucet with a hose and sprayer is definitely helpful. I love this sink and it is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Packaging and Beautiful Sink
customer_reviews.text: The shipping box arrived so badly damaged on one corner that I thoroughly documented the unboxing expecting damage to the sink. To my surprise the sink was undamaged and looked beautiful ... a tribute to the manufacturer's care in designing the shipping container. My wife is thrilled with the Ruvati sink!
customer_reviews.author: LKN

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what is described/pic. Works great. Happy with purchase. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Villazon

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! This sink is completely insulated underneath so you don't have any annoying metal clank when something drops in it. Also helps immensely when you run a garbage disposal. Feels very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Lester

customer_reviews.title: Sits better on top than underneath
customer_reviews.text: I loved the quality of just the feel, heft, and weight of the sink! The sink looks like it would cost around $1600.00. My only dislike was they gave you a drain but no garbage disposal drain if you were using a garbage disposal
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and beautiful sink
customer_reviews.text: Many times when you order a product this heavy and bulky you take a chance on it being damaged for various reasons. This sink is very well packaged and protected and speaks to the quality of the product. Just by the way they have taken the time to ensure it's protected, you know it's a quality made product. This is a beautiful sink and I'm extremely pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Owen

customer_reviews.title: looks great and all the extras are fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is a truly HIGH QUALITY item. We are doing a kitchen remodel and I can't wait to see it in place!! It's heavy gauge, looks great and all the extras are fantastic!! I ordered this item and it was on my door step 2 or 3 days later. The packaging of this item was the most meticulous thing I've ever seen. I HIGHLY recommend this product and the provider!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jumbo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sink
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the stainless steel deep sink. How it was placed in the box and packaging was incredible. The sink itself came inside of a large Valore bag. It just showed me there was pride in the workmanship
customer_reviews.author: Linda Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and very impressive packaging
customer_reviews.text: We are renovating and are not at the point of installing the sink yet. I was very very impressed with how well it was packaged. Also just as impressed with the quality of the sink and the accessories. Can't wait to install it when my island is finished being built.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa D

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely loved it, amenities included awesome. Unfortunately we had to return it because it was one inch larger than what we needed. We highly recommend it. High quality material not cheap looking at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: great sink
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sink. A great buy, i wouldn't hesitate to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cordray

customer_reviews.title: Nice sink.
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet. Plenty of room for larger pans and platters to be washed. I rarely use the cutting board or strainer but the bottom grate an top rail platform is used all the time. And the price isn’t prohibitive. Nice sink.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Willis

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: We have had the sink installed for a month now in our new house...we are in love❤️ Great depth, tough enough to live with 6 of us and the extras that came with it have been great!
customer_reviews.author: Reads too much

customer_reviews.title: What’s not to love?!?!?
customer_reviews.text: Deep sink, functional, great features. Everyone who walks into our kitchen loves the look and features.
customer_reviews.author: mommyof2

customer_reviews.title: Great product, excellent price
customer_reviews.text: I am a building contractor, I purchase allot of product. This is made exceptionally well very high quality for the price. Comparable brand would be at least $800.00 I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mark LaMar

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Easy to Use and So Well Made
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how much I love this sink! My contractor husband was skeptical at buying one online, but his mind was certainly changed by this well made product. The extra pieces ( cutting board, colander and dry rack) also make this a sink so very useful. It makes my new kitchen all the more beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, heavy duty sink with great accessories
customer_reviews.text: We have not used the sink yet as we are still in the process of building our new home but it is set in the counter and looks awesome! I love all the accessories that came with it!
customer_reviews.author: REESE NETTLES

customer_reviews.title: Great sink!
customer_reviews.text: What a great price for this sink, especially with all the extras that it came with.
customer_reviews.author: Agostino

customer_reviews.title: A great deal!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very high quality and the packing was brilliant with a very classy black bag. The accessories are heavy, gorgeous and high quality to match the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Robert I.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sink
customer_reviews.text: This sink is AMAZING! Love the size and all the extras it comes with. Also came packaged very well from the manufacturer. Looks perfwct in our new kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: SanaNe

customer_reviews.title: The quality is second to none
customer_reviews.text: Great product heavy duty stuff nothing cheap here glad I found this one above the rest
customer_reviews.author: P. Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Amazing functionality and style
customer_reviews.text: This sink is amazing! High quality, looks great and the functionality of the inserts with the cutting board, strainer and drying rack make extra space in a small kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: not installed yet, but so far an exceptional value
customer_reviews.text: Heavy steel, well packaged, shipped in timely manner to Canada. Using the sink as a work surface is a clever concept. We'll see in the long term, but it appears as a very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Jean-Paul Bataille

customer_reviews.title: Great sink! Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Returned the previous 2 sinks after this one arrived. This sink is built was better and far superior to the other options. The sink I returned looked the same but was only 1/4 of the weight of this sink and made real flimsy. This is a solid sink, with weight to it, and the coating underneath absorbs the sound of using daily.
customer_reviews.author: michael springer

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: I renovated the kitchen and looked at a lot of sinks and settled on this one due to the reviews and the number of included items. After 4 days with the sink in use, I love it. The silicone drying rack is the best and I've used the cutting board a number of times. I'm very happy with this purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: SGEngel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and functional
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our kitchen remodel. We love how big it is and we love all the accessories it came with. It looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great value!  Love the accessories!
customer_reviews.text: I like the sink very much! I love the attachments that come with it, well worth the few extra bucks compared to others. Good quality and a nice addition to our new kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Angela in DFW

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty sink. I also really love the accompanying items that it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley L Morse

customer_reviews.title: Buy this it is great, you will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my new kitchen. This farm sink is absolutly gorgeous. Extremely excellent quality. Even the pakageing presentation. The extra ad ons are also great quality This sink looks very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Hauland

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it, Enough said. She likes the extras. Build a frame out of 2x4s. Then sanded smooth and added some clear coat for water protection. Just in case water gets in there.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Bustamante

customer_reviews.title: Cutting.board is useless
customer_reviews.text: As we have just installed, this we have very preliminary assessments. First, the sink scratches easy and the cutting board is basically useless, since the first time we cut on it we got bad cut grooves. I am not sure I would ever purchase another stainless steal sink
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: sink is well built and better than the big box stores
customer_reviews.author: doug

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: Sink came packaged well and all contents seem ok. Nice sink but have not installed yet. I will update after I have used for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great sink, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome solid stainless farmhouse sink! The brushed finished looks amazing in our kitchen and it is constructed very well.
customer_reviews.author: ArubaDoll

customer_reviews.title: Great quality , excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product at 1/5 the cost of others. And comes with some extras. Quality is excellent , thickness of steel is good , all around great sink for a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Centerpiece of the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: looks amazing.. comes with accessories.we have a U shaped kitchen and the sink is definitely the center piece. it looks amazing similar sinks that we liked where double or more in all the stores we visited. would def recommend this sink to anyone looking at it.
customer_reviews.author: Nick NYG

customer_reviews.title: Love love love my new sink!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing deep farmhouse sink! Love the cutting board and strainer. Came well packaged. Everyone who sees this sink loves it! Highly recommend if you are looking for. Nice big sink!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Martin

customer_reviews.title: Comes custom w/Accessories
customer_reviews.text: I love my Ruvati apron front kitchen sink. Worth every penny I spent to get this product. I would highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ceriese Curth

product_meta.title: Ruvati Verona RVH9200 33" Apron-front Workstation Farmhouse Single Bowl Kitchen Sink, Stainless Steel, 16 Gauge
feature_bullets: Exterior dimensions: 33" (wide) x 22" (front-to-back) | Interior bowl dimension: 30" (wide) x 16" (front-to-back) x 10" (bowl depth)
Standard 3.5" drain opening will fit most garbage disposal unit
Included in box: Sink, Cutting Board, Colander, Roll-up Rack, Bottom Rinse Grid, Basket Strainer, Drain Assembly and Installation Guide | Limited Lifetime Warranty - Ruvati USA
Heavy duty SOUND GUARD UNDERCOATING and THICK RUBBER PADDING to minimize noise and reduce condensation | SLOPED BOTTOM allows complete water drainage | Slightly CURVED CORNERS for easy cleaning.
16 GAUGE Premium T-304 Grade Stainless Steel (18/10 Chromium/Nickel) | Commercial grade BRUSHED FINISH
